comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: That Yarr coin is seriously one of CryptoImperator's best. I love the Dollar sign and the Euro symbol swirling around in the water looking like they're about to drown, and Bitcoin sailing through the hectic seas with nothing impacting it. His silver coins are simply amazing, probably the best silver coins in all of Bitcoin collectibles.
